snippet: America has 320 million people, so how do we keep ending up with the same two surnames running things?
abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column contends the release of official papers by the Clinton library, which was a reminder of the turbulent Clinton years, should make Americans fatigued by the looming prospect of a competition between Jeb Bush and Hillary Rodham Clinton in 2016.
lead_paragraph: America has 320 million people, so how do we keep ending up with the same two surnames running things?

headline.main: Brace Yourself for Hillary and Jeb
headline.print_headline: Brace Yourself for Hillary and Jeb
